mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, content, wait_time, background_color, text_color, button_color, powered_by_name, powered_by_icon, status, create_time, update_time FROM transit_page WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE transit_page SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, wait_time = #{waitTime}, background_color = #{backgroundColor}, text_color = #{textColor}, button_color = #{buttonColor}, powered_by_name = #{poweredByName}, powered_by_icon = #{poweredByIcon}, status = #{status} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
